Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.game

Class GameHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.game.GameHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
GameHandler4P
public class GameHandler extends Object
GameHandler is a wrapper class around game that stores the information about the state of the match. Game stores all the objects and the data relative to the game, while its gameHandler stores its state and handles the turn progressions.
